languages.text: Сам{mf||а} Лорд-капитан был{mf||а} ранен{mf||а} в той схватке. И тогда Оптикон-22 во главе когорты элитных скитариев ворвался на поле боя.
The Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} was wounded in battle. It was at that moment that Opticon-22 walked onto the battlefield with his cohort of elite Skitarii.
languages.original_text: Сам{mf||а} Лорд-капитан был{mf||а} ранен{mf||а} в той схватке. И тогда Оптикон-22 во главе когорты элитных скитариев ворвался на поле боя.

traits.locale_text: The Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} was wounded in battle. It was at that moment that Opticon-22 walked onto the battlefield with his troop of elite Skitarii.
The Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} was wounded in battle. It was at that moment that Opticon-22 walked onto the battlefield with his troop of elite Skitarii.
The Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} was wounded in battle. It was at that moment that Opticon-22 walked onto the battlefield with his troop of elite Skitarii.
The Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} was wounded in battle. It was at that moment that Opticon-22 walked onto the battlefield with his troop of elite Skitarii.
The Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} was wounded in battle. It was at that moment that Opticon-22 walked onto the battlefield with his cohort of elite Skitarii.
The Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} was wounded in battle. It was at that moment that Opticon-22 walked onto the battlefield with his cohort of elite Skitarii.

languages.text: 就连舰长大人本人都在战斗中受了伤。就在这个时候，奥普蒂孔22号与他的护教军精英部队出现在了战场上。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} was wounded in battle. It was at that moment that Opticon-22 walked onto the battlefield with his cohort of elite Skitarii.

traits.locale_text: 就连舰长大人本人都在战斗中受了伤。就在这个时候，奥普蒂孔22号与他的护教军精英部队出现在了战场上。

languages.text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} s'est {mf|retrouvé blessé|retrouvée blessée} dans la bataille. C'est à ce moment-là qu'Opticon-22 a fait son entrée sur le champ de bataille avec sa cohorte de skitarii d'élite.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} was wounded in battle. It was at that moment that Opticon-22 walked onto the battlefield with his cohort of elite Skitarii.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} s'est {mf|retrouvé blessé|retrouvée blessée} dans la bataille. C'est à ce moment-là qu'Opticon-22 a fait son entrée sur le champ de bataille avec sa troupe de skitarii d'élite.

languages.text: ロード・キャプテン自身も戦場で負傷した。その時、オプティコン-22が精鋭のスキタリ部隊を引き連れて戦場に現れた。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} was wounded in battle. It was at that moment that Opticon-22 walked onto the battlefield with his cohort of elite Skitarii.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテン自身も戦場で負傷した。その時、オプティコン-22が精鋭のスキタリ部隊を引き連れて戦場に現れた。

languages.text: {mf|El|La} propi{mf|o|a} Lord Capitán salió herid{mf|o|a} durante el combate. En ese momento, Opticon-22 y sus Skitarii de élite entraron al campo de batalla.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} was wounded in battle. It was at that moment that Opticon-22 walked onto the battlefield with his cohort of elite Skitarii.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} propi{mf|o|a} Lord Capitán salió herid{mf|o|a} durante el combate. En ese momento, Opticon-22 y sus Skitarii de élite entraron al campo de batalla.

languages.text: Der Lord Captain selbst wurde im Kampf verwundet. In diesem Augenblick trat Opticon-22 mit seiner Kohorte von Skitarii-Elitekämpfern auf das Schlachtfeld.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} was wounded in battle. It was at that moment that Opticon-22 walked onto the battlefield with his cohort of elite Skitarii.

traits.locale_text: Der Lord Captain selbst wurde im Kampf verwundet. In diesem Augenblick trat Opticon-22 mit seinen Skitarii-Elitetruppen auf das Schlachtfeld.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan'ın kendisi de savaş esnasında yaralanmıştı. İşte tam o anda Opticon-22, elit Skitarius taburuyla birlikte savaş alanında daldı.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain {mf|himself|herself} was wounded in battle. It was at that moment that Opticon-22 walked onto the battlefield with his cohort of elite Skitarii.
